task.title: Adding Tags to Items
task.shortdesc: You can add tags to items in order to assign specific items labels.

step.cmd: Select the item from the center pane
Click the Tags tab in the right-hand pane

step.info: You can rename a tag by clicking on it and typing the new name and delete tags using the minus “–” button.

taskbody.result: Once you have added the tag it will appear in the tag selector in the left pane.
